title: Mondrian Doha Contemporary Luxury in West Bay with Daily Breakfast & QAR200 Resort Credit
description:
Discover the pulse of Qatar as you immerse yourself in the artistic grandeur of this stunning hotel, a sophisticated five-star haven of luxury and architectural brilliance. Set in the bustling heart of West Bay, Qatar's famed shopping and dining district, Mondrian Doha boasts award-winning design and a captivating indoor rooftop pool.

Indulge in world-class dining across the six restaurants and bars, where you can sample authentic Mediterranean flavours, savour Japanese cuisine and sip on mind-blowing cocktails. For some classic pampering, head to ESPA at Mondrian Doha, where shimmering mosaic walls lead to a heated experience garden and a traditional Turkish hammam bath.
offer_address: West Bay Lagoon, Doha, Qatar

title: Iconic Doha Katara Towers Decadence with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktails & Spa Credit
description:
With commanding views over the ultra-modern Lusail city, Doha Waterfront and sparkling Arabian Gulf, this five-star hotel stands out as a beacon of glamour in a location heralded for world-class decadence.

Fairmont Doha occupies an enviable position within the second spur of the iconic Katara Towers, a landmark building resembling the crossed scimitars of the nation's seal. 

Walk into the futuristic lobby - adorned with the world's tallest chandelier - and you are thrown into a world of forward-thinking opulence. Here, you'll find a famous lobby lounge, known for its elegant Parisian afternoon tea.

For dining, look out over Doha from the Sky Balcony of Provok Asian Project and uncover molecular gastronomy over four acts of culinary exploration at Masala Library, by celebrity chef Jiggs Kalra. When it comes time to relax, explore 4,000 square metres of heaven at Fairmont Spa or wade through two resort-style pools.
offer_address: Street 6, Marina District, Lusail, Doha 4747, Qatar

vendor_name: Marsa Malaz Kempinski, The Pearl - Doha
title: Famed Kempinski Luxury in Modern Qatar
description: Experience famed Kempinski service in the cosmopolitan capital of Qatar at Marsa Malaz Kempinski, The Pearl - Doha, located on a blissful, manmade private island. An ideal stopover or a great getaway on its own, Doha is bursting with art, culture, high-end restaurants and shopping. Enjoy daily gourmet buffet breakfast, one buffet dinner, plus 20% off spa treatments and beverages. Perfect for families: one child aged 11 years and under stays free!
location_description: Marsa Malaz Kempinski, The Pearl - Doha
offer_address: The Pearl - Doha, Costa Malaz Bay, Doha, Qatar

title: Sophisticated MGallery Stay Near Doha's Oldest Souq
description:
Accept an invitation to explore old-world hospitality and cosmopolitan sophistication, where progressive spirits ignite new futures, at the Alwadi Hotel Doha MGallery. Experience a quintessential Qatarian escape, staying next to the vibrant Souq Waqif old market in the revitalised Msheireb Downtown Doha precinct.

Your package includes daily à la carte breakfast at Le Colonial, a one-time decadent set menu for two at O’Glacee or Sofra restaurant and one beer, wine or soft drink per person, per stay, enjoyed poolside or at the rooftop lounge. Plus, benefit from a guaranteed late 6pm checkout or 10am early check-in and 20% discount on food, drinks and massage treatments at the spa.

⏱**Buy now, book later**: Secure this deal now and choose your travel dates when you're ready (see Fine Print for details).
offer_address: Wadi Musheirib St, Doha, Qatar

title: Arabian Elegance in the Heart of Doha with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
description:
Step into a world of opulence in Qatar's capital with a stay at this central Doha jewel. Located in the heart of Msheireb Downtown district, this five-star retreat is a stone's throw from the vibrant Souq Waqif market and the impressive Museum of Islamic Art.

Savour world-class dining at Opus, where Mediterranean-inspired dishes are cooked in an open kitchen, or enjoy a rejuvenating treatment at the luxurious, multi-levelled onsite spa.

Here, views of Doha's skyline and the crescent-shaped Corniche are unbeatable, and the dining choices are par excellence with three sumptuous restaurants, including award-winning Sora Rooftop restaurant serving indulgent Japanese fare.

With the city's thriving business district and cultural attractions on your doorstep, this is the perfect base for both leisure and business travellers.
offer_address: Sikkat Wadi Msheireb Street, Doha, Qatar

title: Ultra-Stylish Qatar Stopover
description: Discover the centuries-old souks, falcon markets, spice stalls and modern buildings of Qatar’s capital of Doha with a two-night stopover at the ultra-stylish Mondrian Doha. Includes daily continental buffet breakfasts at CUT by Wolfgang Puck, welcome drinks, one casual burger dinner at Hudson Tavern and an early check-in or late checkout.
offer_address: Doha, Qatar

vendor_name: Centara West Bay Residences & Suites Doha
title: Stylish Stay in the World's Hottest Up-and-Coming Stopover Destination
description: Embrace the culture of the lesser explored stopover destination of Doha and stay where the city meets the sea at the modern Centara West Bay Residences & Suites. Located in the heart of Doha, close to the city's main attractions including ancient souks, five-star restaurants, the falcon hospital and starting points for desert adventures amongst the dunes, the chic apartment-style accommodation of the Centara is perfect for short and long stays. Includes one dinner at Caprice restaurant, one beer or soft drink each, daily breakfast and a guaranteed late checkout until 6pm.
location_description: Centara West Bay Residences & Suites Doha

title: Arabian Elegance in the Heart of Doha with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktail & Dining Discount
description:

Savour world-class dining at Opus, where Qatari heritage meets global gastronomy, or enjoy a rejuvenating treatment at the luxurious Sikka Spa.

title: Oceanfront Luxury on Doha's Longest Natural Private Beach with Seven Onsite Restaurants
description: Beachfront luxury is the icing on the cake at InterContinental Doha Residences, an IHG Hotel, which boasts an unbeatable location along Doha’s longest natural private beach. When you're not taking a dip in the outdoor pool or making tracks across silky soft sand, dine at any of the hotel's seven onsite restaurants and delight your inner foodie. Whether it's a Parisian-style lounge, Mediterranean delights or sizzling Mexican, you're guaranteed to satisfy your tastebuds during your stay.
location_description: InterContinental Doha Residences, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: West Bay Beach, Doha, Qatar

vendor_name: Marsa Malaz Kempinski, The Pearl - Doha
title: Five-Star Kempinski Luxury on Doha's The Pearl-Qatar Island with Private Beach & Outdoor Pools
description: Experience signature Kempinski service in the cosmopolitan capital of Qatar at the five-star Marsa Malaz Kempinski, The Pearl - Doha, located on The Pearl-Qatar, a blissful, man-made island. An ideal stopover or a great getaway on its own, Doha is bursting with art, culture, high-end restaurants and premium shopping. Explore the urban metropolis before retreating to your palatial accommodation, with seven restaurants and four stylish bars and lounges offering unique culinary experiences. Plus, a private beach and outdoor pools promise plenty of space to unwind and soak up the sun, while a fitness centre, tennis court, two padel courts and watersports activities will keep you up and moving during your escape.
location_description: Marsa Malaz Kempinski, The Pearl - Doha
offer_address: The Pearl Marsa Malaz Island - Costa Malaz Bay, Marina Drive, Doha, Qatar

title: Sky-High Doha Escape in Vibrant West Bay with Six Restaurants & Bars & State-of-the-Art Spa
description:
Experience the epitome of Qatari hospitality at this five-star retreat, perfectly positioned in the heart of Doha's vibrant West Bay district. Pullman Doha West Bay  is a playground for leisure and business travellers alike, boasting a collection of contemporary rooms, suites and apartments that offer panoramic views of the Arabian Gulf and the city's glittering skyline.

The hotel's central location puts you in the middle of the action: explore the bustling Souq Waqif, brimming with aromatic spices, traditional garments and handcrafted souvenirs, or indulge in retail therapy at The Gate Mall and Doha City Centre shopping malls. Return to the hotel to savour a world of flavours at the hotel's six restaurants and bars, rejuvenate body and mind at the onsite spa, or simply kick back and relax at the outdoor pool.
offer_address: Al Shatt Street, Doha, Qatar, 18181

title: Doha Beachfront Indulgence with Six Restaurants, Four Pools & Luxe Spa
description:
Soak up sweeping Arabian Gulf views and five-star indulgence from this glamorous Rixos beachfront haven, set along Doha’s Corniche and just minutes from Souq Waqif and the Museum of Islamic Art. Savour dry-aged cuts at Mr. Tailor, Mediterranean indulgence at Akte Pier 51, and Pan-Indian favourites at Rasa.

Between gourmet adventures and dips in the infinity pool, discover family fun at the Rixy Kids' Club or explore upscale shopping at nearby malls like Mall of Qatar. Whether seeking cultural immersion or seaside relaxation, this lavish oasis captures the vibrant soul of modern Doha.
offer_address: Ras Abu Aboud, Street 920 Zone 28, Doha 1911, Qatar

title: Five-Star Doha Sky-High Escape with Luxury Day Spa & Kids' Club
description: Be part of Doha's silver skyline when you stay at the soaring voco Doha West Bay Suites, an IHG Hotel, a 46-story skyscraper with epic views and sublime service. Hungry? Enjoy a spot of fine dining on the terrace at The Social, or snack on light bites and fruity mocktails at Serenitea cafe. Bored? Take a dip in the vast outdoor swimming pool, leave the kids to explore the fun kids' club and game room, or be pampered at the tranquil Al Jawhary Salon and Spa. There's something for everyone here.
location_description: voco Doha West Bay Suites, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 5863 Al Intisar Street, Doha, Qatar

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Doha - The Business Park
title: Contemporary City Break in Doha's Bustling Business and Financial District
description: With a prime location in the middle of Doha's financial district, Holiday Inn Doha - The Business Park, an IHG Hotel is a convenient home away from home. Perfect for business travellers, with a modern business centre and seven flexible meeting spaces, this contemporary hotel features an outdoor pool and fitness centre. When your work is done, relax over a coffee in the lobby or enjoy a delicious meal at the all-day dining restaurant Sirocco. Leisure isn't left behind - explore local attractions, including Souq Waqif and Doha Corniche, just a few minutes away.
location_description: Holiday Inn Doha - The Business Park, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Business Park Airport Road, Doha, Qatar

title: Five-Star Downtown Doha Urban Escape with Two Rooftop Swimming Pools
description: In the centre of the lively Msheireb Downtown Doha lies the elegant five-star Mandarin Oriental, Doha - a blend of both traditional Qatari heritage and urban contemporary touches. Indulge in the hotel’s nine onsite eateries and bars, ranging from innovative French Mediterranean dining to Chinese cuisine to freshly baked patisserie and cakes. Pamper yourself in the onsite spa, complete with six private treatment rooms, indoor spa pools and a gold quartz sand treatment bed. Head up to the rooftop to take a dip in one of the two temperature controlled swimming pools as you soak in views of the stunning cityscape, or venture out of the bespoke hotel into the cultural heart of the city to experience historic museums and vibrant marketplaces only moments away.
offer_address: Barahat Msheireb Street, Msheireb Downtown Doha PO Box 23643 Doha, Qatar

title: Five-Star Doha Kempinski Suites in Vibrant West Bay's Tallest Tower
description: Experience the height of opulence when staying at the five-star Kempinski Residences & Suites, Doha, a signature luxury brand housed in a soaring 256-metre tower. Expect epic views of Doha's sprawling metropolis and the prestigious West Bay during your stay. In addition to spectacular panoramas, enjoy a world of fine food at the onsite restaurants. There are three venues to explore, including a boutique bakery, a modern Mexican kitchen and authentic Pan-Asian cuisine. At the PURE Leisure & Wellness Centre, enjoy two temperature-controlled indoor swimming pools and a steam room for a chance to relax and recharge.
offer_address: Al Qassar Street, Doha, Qatar

title: Beachfront Opulence in Doha with Qatar’s Largest Waterpark, Private Beach & Onsite Dining
description:
Sprawling across five acres, Rixos Premium Qetaifan Island North is a waterfront destination for five-star hospitality and world-class entertainment. Enjoy panoramic sea or waterpark views from lavish, light-filled accommodations, and choose from five diverse dining options - some with all-inclusive plans - to suit every taste.

Beyond the private beach, beach club and three pools, the resort is steps from vibrant nightlife, cinemas and Qatar’s largest waterpark, Meryal Waterpark, featuring 53 slides and 69 attractions for all ages. Stay active with the fitness centre, tennis courts and watersports, or unwind at the Turkish-inspired Naturelife Spa, complete with a Hammam, steam room, sauna and elegant treatment rooms.
offer_address: Qetaifan Island North, Street 305 Zone 69 Lusail City, Lusail, Doha, Qatar

title: Luxury Five-Star Escape in the Heart of Doha
description: Accept an invitation to old-world hospitality and cosmopolitan sophistication at the InterContinental Doha - The City, an IHG Hotel. Experience a quintessential Qatarian escape within an easy walk of the vibrant City Center Doha Mall, DECC Station, and the hypnotic Museum of Illusions. When not in your modern accommodation overlooking the sea or the city's sweeping skyline, relax in the swimming pool, work out at the fitness centre or head to one of seven world-class restaurants.
location_description: InterContinental Doha - The City, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: West Bay PO Box 22178, Doha, Qatar

title: Five-Star Doha Katara Towers Luxury with Arabian Gulf Views
description: Experience the epitome of Doha's modern luxury at this sophisticated sanctuary housed within the iconic Katara Towers overlooking the picturesque Arabian Gulf. From the majestic architectural design of the Katara Towers to the meticulously curated guest rooms and suites, every aspect of your stay exudes elegance and refinement. Indulge in the opulence of your exquisitely appointed accommodation offering breathtaking views of the Arabian Gulf or the vibrant Lusail City skyline. With world-class service and state-of-the-art amenities, Fairmont Doha ensures that your stay is nothing short of extraordinary.
offer_address: 6th street, Lusail Marina District, Lusail City, Doha, 4747, Qatar

title: Five-Star Beachfront Doha Escape with 11 Restaurants & Bars
description: Experience the height of opulence when staying at the five-star InterContinental Doha Beach & Spa, an IHG Hotel, offering a quintessential Qatari escape. Expect dazzling city skyline and shimmering Arabian Sea views from your modern accommodation. Relax in one of the glittering swimming pools and when hunger hits, head to one of the 11 restaurants and bars. When it's time to explore Doha, you'll find yourself within close reach of Souq Waqif, The Pearl and Doha Corniche.
location_description: InterContinental Doha Beach & Spa, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Street 900, Bldg. No.25, Zone 61, Al Dafna West Bay., DOHA, QA, 6822

title: Five-Star Central Doha Glamour with Rooftop Bar, Nine Restaurants & Indoor Pool
description:
Soar above the city in Doha’s buzzing Al Sadd district, where striking contemporary architecture meets Qatari elegance at this landmark address. Inside La Cigale Hotel Managed by Accor, soaring atriums, Venetian-style chandeliers, and polished cherry wood floors set the tone for an indulgent stay. Each room and suite offers plush bedding, a personalised pillow menu, and designer amenities, ensuring comfort at every turn.

Culinary enthusiasts can explore nine dining venues, from Mediterranean seafood at Le Central to signature Italian fare at Di Capri, and rooftop cocktails at Sky View. Unwind with a relaxing swim in the heated indoor pool and rejuvenate with soothing treatments at the Ozone Spa. With Souq Waqif, the Museum of Islamic Art, and the Corniche nearby, this hotel is the perfect launchpad for exploring Doha’s rich culture and vibrant city life.
location_description: La Cigale Hotel Managed by Accor
offer_address: 60 Suhaim Bin Hamad Street, Al Sadd Area, Doha, Qatar

vendor_name: Al Najada Doha Hotel Apartments by Tivoli
title: Sleek Doha Oasis in the Heart of Qatar
description: Discover the ancient culture and refined luxury of Qatar with a stay at the lavish Al Najada Doha Hotel by Tivoli. The resort boasts extensive views and sumptuous modern design with amenities to match. After days spent exploring the historic marketplace Souq Waqif, adjacent to the hotel, retreat to your tranquil oasis to take a deep in the refreshing pool and enjoy a cocktail at the Pool Bar, or indulge in traditional flavours at Al Baraha Restaurant.
location_description: Al Najada Doha Hotel by Tivoli
offer_address: Barahat Al Jufairi Street, Al Najada, Doha, Qatar

title: Doha Modern Luxury in Old Town with Five Onsite Restaurants
description: Uncover Qatar’s gorgeous heritage during your stay at Abesq Doha Hotel & Residences, located in the heart of Old Town. This contemporary hotel offers complete relaxation, with an opulent onsite spa, library and outdoor pool at your fingertips. Be spoilt for choice with five culinary destinations and hand-crafted drinks at Sprezzi pool bar, just a stroll away.
offer_address: Suhaim Bin Hamad Street, Doha, Qatar

vendor_name: Al Najada Doha Hotel Apartments by Oaks
title: Contemporary Doha Apartment-Style Escape Minutes from Souq Waqif
description: From traditional souqs to modern mega malls, Doha is a dynamic city - yours to explore from Al Najada Doha Hotel Apartments by Oaks. When you're not exploring the sprawling city's sights (the famous Souq Waqif is only a seven-minute drive away), stay in and enjoy a meal at Al Baraha Restaurant, located in the hotel's sister hotel next door. The swimming pool offers the perfect respite from the day's heat, and the pool bar serves up refreshing drinks and snacks.
location_description: Al Najada Doha Hotel Apartments by Oaks
offer_address: Barahat Al Jufairi Street, Al Najada, Doha, Qatar

vendor_name: Souq Waqif Boutique Hotels by Tivoli
title: Doha Souq Waqif Luxury with Some of the Best Restaurants in Doha
description: Tradition meets contemporary luxury at Souq Waqif Boutique Hotels by Tivoli, a high-end escape in the heart of Doha's bustling city centre. When you're not exploring the city's world-famous Souq Waqif (located right outside the hotel's doors) and perusing spices, perfumes and artefacts, head to The Spa and experience a Moroccan hammam, cool off in the outdoor pool or indulge at the four restaurants serving everything from handmade pastries to French favourites and hot mezze.
location_description: Souq Waqif Boutique Hotels by Tivoli
offer_address: Souq Waqif, P.O. Box 3496 Doha, Qatar

vendor_name: Crowne Plaza Doha The Business Park
title: Luxury Doha Escape in the Heart of Business Park with Seven Restaurants & Bars
description: Masterfully placed in the centre of Qatar's capital, Crowne Plaza Doha - The Business Park, an IHG Hotel, offers sophisticated luxury and world-renowned hospitality. This urban hideaway boasts a magnificent blend of locally inspired elements with modern amenities. Make yourself at home by the glittering pool, feast your way across seven excellent restaurants, bars and lounges, keep active at the well-equipped gym or venture beyond the hotel to explore this historic city.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Doha - The Business Park, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Airport Road, Doha, Ad-Dawhah, Qatar

vendor_name: Banana Island Resort Doha by Anantara
title: Doha Private Island Hideaway with Eight Restaurants & Anantara Spa
description: Located on a dreamy crescent of gold beach is Banana Island Resort Doha by Anantara, an exclusive luxury island hideaway accessible only by private catamaran. Every moment is magic here: spend your days surfing in the surf pool, splashing around on the private beach, or learning how to dive. Stay on land to catch your favourite flicks in the cinema, bowl a strike in the bowling alley, sample international cuisines at the various dining options or treat yourself to a pampering massage at Anantara Spa.
location_description: Banana Island Resort Doha by Anantara
offer_address: 23919, Doha, Qatar

title: Downtown Doha Apartments near Souq Waqif with Onsite Restaurant & Outdoor Pool
description:
Experience the vibrant heart of Qatar with a stay at this luxurious apartment hotel, ideally located in the dynamic downtown district of Doha. This elegant hotel offers a perfect blend of modern comfort and Qatari tradition, placing you just moments from the city's most celebrated attractions, including the stunning Museum of Islamic Art and the traditional Souq Waqif market.

When you're not exploring the city, retreat to the hotel's state-of-the-art fitness centre or take a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool. Come lunch or dinner, the onsite restaurant serves a tantalising array of international cuisine, while the stylish lounge bar is the perfect spot for an evening drink.
offer_address: Al Badr Street, C Ring Road, Rawdat Al Khail, Doha, 11364, QATAR

title: Contemporary Doha West Bay Stay Moments from Exhibition Center & Doha Corniche
description: Immerse yourself in a city whose eclectic skyline mirrors its atmosphere with a stay at Crowne Plaza Doha West Bay, an IHG Hotel. Wander Qatar’s vibrant financial, shopping and diplomatic district and experience the sheer scale of the city from your central spot. Savour the sights and sounds of the city, from serene strolls along the Corniche promenade to the Museum of Islamic Art and atmospheric Souq Waquif. Between adventures, indulge in local fare at Nidaaya and spend a refreshing afternoon at the glorious outdoor pool.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Doha West Bay, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: District Zone 61, Diplomatic Area, Doha, 21336, Qatar
